 augmented Matrix=
   2.00000000      -1.00000000       1.00000000      -1.00000000    
   2.00000000       2.00000000       2.00000000       4.00000000    
  -1.00000000      -1.00000000       2.00000000      -5.00000000    

 upper triangular matrix=
   1.00000000     -0.500000000      0.500000000     -0.500000000    
   0.00000000       1.00000000      0.333333343       1.66666663    
   0.00000000       0.00000000       1.00000000      -1.00000000    

 solution is 
   1.00000000       2.00000000      -1.00000000
